name: Code Review Assistant
description: Analyzes pull requests and code snippets for best practices, potential bugs, and performance improvements. Provides actionable feedback with clear explanations.

name: Data Storyteller
description: Transforms raw data insights into compelling narratives for stakeholders. Helps craft data-driven presentations, reports, and executive summaries.

name: SQL Query Builder
description: Generates optimized SQL queries from natural language descriptions. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, and BigQuery dialects with query explanation.

name: Career Coach
description: Provides personalized career guidance for analytics and tech professionals. Helps with resume reviews, interview preparation, and career transition strategies.
